TextView.android:text: Spotter. The best tool to maintain motivated while doing a workout

Click 'Start New Workout' to begin your workout. Every weight you lift, record in the app.
Set your weight and an appropriate goal.
Once complete, press 'End Session'. This saves your workout to be viewed another time.
All workouts are recorded so you can see your progress over time.
Keep up the good work and enjoy working out!
Normally, noticable results only appear after months of diligent excercise. With Spotter you can actually measure the difference you are making in a matter of days. You can see yourself getting stronger.
